name: Java
author: contact@velrix.net
description: A mature, versatile language known for reliability and cross-platform performance, widely used in enterprise systems, Android apps, and backend services.
startup: if [[ -d .git ]] && [[ {{AUTO_UPDATE}} == "1" ]]; then git pull; fi; cd {{APP_PROJECT_DIR}}; if [[ "{{REBUILD}}" == "1" ]] && [ -f pom.xml ]; then mvn clean package; fi; java {{JVM_FLAGS}} -Dterminal.jline=false -Dterminal.ansi=true -jar "{{APP_FILE}}"

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Java Application Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ libtool maven

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

## add git ending if it's not on the address
if [[ ${GIT_ADDRESS} != *.git ]]; then
    GIT_ADDRESS=${GIT_ADDRESS}.git
fi

if [ -z "${GIT_USERNAME}" ] && [ -z "${GIT_ACCESS_TOKEN}" ]; then
    echo -e "using anon api call"
else
    GIT_ADDRESS="https://${GIT_USERNAME}:${GIT_ACCESS_TOKEN}@$(echo -e ${GIT_ADDRESS} | cut -d/ -f3-)"
fi

## pull git java repo
if [ "$(ls -A /mnt/server)" ]; then
    echo -e "/mnt/server directory is not empty."
    if [ -d .git ]; then
        echo -e ".git directory exists"
        if [ -f .git/config ]; then
            echo -e "loading info from git config"
            ORIGIN=$(git config --get remote.origin.url)
        else
            echo -e "files found with no git config"
            echo -e "closing out without touching things to not break anything"
            exit 10
        fi
    fi

    if [ "${ORIGIN}" == "${GIT_ADDRESS}" ]; then
        echo "pulling latest from github"
        git pull
    fi
else
    echo -e "/mnt/server is empty.\ncloning files into repo"
    if [ -z ${GIT_BRANCH} ]; then
        echo -e "cloning default branch"
        git clone ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
    else
        echo -e "cloning ${GIT_BRANCH}'"
        git clone --single-branch --branch ${GIT_BRANCH} ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
    fi
fi

cd {{APP_PROJECT_DIR}}
if [ -f pom.xml ]; then
    echo "pom.xml found, running mvn clean package..."
    mvn clean package
fi

echo -e "install complete"
exit 0
